cryptos.name: InQubeta
cryptos.reason: A project enabling investment in AI startups through fractionalized NFTs, appealing to investors looking for innovative opportunities in emerging technologies.

cryptos.name: Domini
cryptos.reason: Focuses on asset tokenization for shares in collectibles, catering to the growing luxury and collectible market within the DeFi space.

cryptos.name: Borroe Finance
cryptos.reason: Simplifies cash flow for digital creators through tokenized invoices, streamlining transactions in the growing gig economy.
